H0.text: By what score did GB beat Belgium to win the Davis Cup in November 2015. 3-0

H1.text: By what score did GB beat Belgium to win the Davis Cup in November 2015. 3-2

H2.text: By what score did GB beat Belgium to win the Davis Cup in November 2015. 4-1

H3.text: By what score did GB beat Belgium to win the Davis Cup in November 2015. 3-1

A4.text: They made the final again, in 2015, when they lost to Great Britain yet again.
